00035 MeshImplTags::TagData::~TagData() 
00036 {
00037   if (elementData) 
00038     free(elementData);
00039   if (vertexData)
00040     free(vertexData);
00041   if (defaultValue)
00042     free(defaultValue);
00043 }

00045 
00046 void MeshImplTags::clear()
00047 {
00048   for (std::vector<TagData*>::iterator iter = tagList.begin();
00049        iter != tagList.end(); ++iter)
00050     if (*iter)
00051       delete *iter;
00052   
00053   tagList.clear();
00054 }
00055 
00056 size_t MeshImplTags::size_from_tag_type( Mesh::TagType type )
00057 {
00058   switch( type ) {
00059     case Mesh::BYTE:   return 1;
00060     case Mesh::BOOL:   return sizeof(bool);
00061     case Mesh::DOUBLE: return sizeof(double);
00062     case Mesh::INT:    return sizeof(int);
00063     case Mesh::HANDLE: return sizeof(void*);
00064     default: assert(0); return 0;
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 size_t MeshImplTags::create( const std::string& name,
00069                              Mesh::TagType type,
00070                              unsigned length,
00071                              const void* defval,
00072                              MsqError& err )
00073 {
00074   size_t h = handle( name, err );
00075   if (h)
00076   {
00077     MSQ_SETERR(err)(name, MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00078     return 0;
00079   }
00080   
00081   if (length == 0 || size_from_tag_type(type) == 0)
00082   {
00083     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00084     return 0;
00085   }
00086   
00087   TagData* tag = new TagData( name, type, length );
00088   h = tagList.size();
00089   tagList.push_back(tag);
00090   
00091   if (defval)
00092   {
00093     tag->defaultValue = malloc( tag->desc.size );
00094     memcpy( tag->defaultValue, defval, tag->desc.size );
00095   }
00096   
00097   return h+1;
00098 }
00099 
00100 size_t MeshImplTags::create( const TagDescription& desc,
00101                              const void* defval,
00102                              MsqError& err )
00103 {
00104   size_t h = handle( desc.name.c_str(), err );
00105   if (h)
00106   {
00107     MSQ_SETERR(err)(desc.name.c_str(), MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00108     return 0;
00109   }
00110   
00111   err.clear();
00112   if (desc.size == 0 || (desc.size % size_from_tag_type(desc.type)) != 0)
00113   {
00114     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00115     return 0;
00116   }
00117   
00118   TagData* tag = new TagData( desc );
00119   h = tagList.size();
00120   tagList.push_back(tag);
00121   
00122   if (defval)
00123   {
00124     tag->defaultValue = malloc( tag->desc.size );
00125     memcpy( tag->defaultValue, defval, tag->desc.size );
00126   }
00127   
00128   return h+1;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void MeshImplTags::destroy( size_t tag_index, MsqError& err )
00132 {
00133   --tag_index;
00134   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || 0 == tagList[tag_index])
00135   {
00136     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND);
00137     return ;
00138   }
00139   
00140   delete tagList[tag_index];
00141   tagList[tag_index] = 0;
00142 }
00143 
00144 size_t MeshImplTags::handle( const std::string& name, MsqError& err ) const
00145 {
00146   for (size_t i = 0; i < tagList.size(); ++i)
00147     if (tagList[i] && tagList[i]->desc.name == name)
00148       return i+1;
00149       
00150   return 0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 const TagDescription& MeshImplTags::properties( size_t tag_index, MsqError& err ) const
00154 {
00155   static TagDescription dummy_desc;
00156   --tag_index;
00157   
00158   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || !tagList[tag_index])
00159   {
00160     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00161     return dummy_desc;
00162   }
00163   
00164   return tagList[tag_index]->desc;
00165 }

00167 
00168 void MeshImplTags::set_element_data( size_t tag_index,
00169                                      size_t num_indices,
00170                                      const size_t* index_array,
00171                                      const void* values,
00172                                      MsqError& err )
00173 {
00174   size_t i;
00175   char* data;
00176   --tag_index;
00177   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || !tagList[tag_index])
00178   {
00179     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00180     return;
00181   }
00182   
00183   TagData* tag = tagList[tag_index];
00184   
00185     // Get highest element index
00186   size_t total = tag->elementCount;
00187   for (i = 0; i < num_indices; ++i)
00188     if (index_array[i] >= total)
00189       total = index_array[i] + 1;
00190   
00191     // If need more space
00192   if (total > tag->elementCount)
00193   {
00194       // allocate more space
00195     tag->elementData = realloc( tag->elementData, tag->desc.size * total );
00196       // if a default value, initialize new space with it
00197     if (tag->defaultValue)
00198     {
00199       data = ((char*)tag->elementData) + tag->elementCount * tag->desc.size;
00200       for (i = tag->elementCount; i < total; ++i)
00201       {
00202         memcpy( data, tag->defaultValue, tag->desc.size );
00203         data += tag->desc.size;
00204       }
00205     }
00206     else
00207     {
00208       memset( (char*)tag->elementData + tag->elementCount * tag->desc.size, 0, 
00209               (total - tag->elementCount) * tag->desc.size );
00210     }
00211     tag->elementCount = total;
00212   }
00213   
00214     // Store passed tag values
00215   data = (char*)tag->elementData;
00216   const char* iter = (const char*)values;
00217   for (i = 0; i < num_indices; ++i)
00218   {
00219     memcpy( data + index_array[i]*tag->desc.size, iter, tag->desc.size );
00220     iter += tag->desc.size;
00221   }
00222 }
00223 
00224 void MeshImplTags::get_element_data( size_t tag_index,
00225                                      size_t num_indices,
00226                                      const size_t* index_array,
00227                                      void* values,
00228                                      MsqError& err ) const
00229 {
00230   --tag_index;
00231   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || !tagList[tag_index])
00232   {
00233     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00234     return;
00235   }
00236   
00237   TagData* tag = tagList[tag_index];
00238   
00239   char* iter = (char*)values;
00240   const char* data = (const char*)tag->elementData;
00241   
00242   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_indices; ++i)
00243   {
00244     const void* ptr;
00245     size_t index = index_array[i];
00246     if (index >= tag->elementCount)
00247     {
00248       ptr = tag->defaultValue;
00249       if (!ptr)
00250       {
00251         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND);
00252         return;
00253       }
00254     }
00255     else
00256     {
00257       ptr = data + index * tag->desc.size;
00258     }
00259     
00260     memcpy( iter, ptr, tag->desc.size );
00261     iter += tag->desc.size;
00262   }
00263 }

00265 void MeshImplTags::set_vertex_data( size_t tag_index,
00266                                     size_t num_indices,
00267                                     const size_t* index_array,
00268                                     const void* values,
00269                                     MsqError& err )
00270 {

00277     return;
00278   }
00279   
00280   TagData* tag = tagList[tag_index];
00281   
00282     // Get highest element index
00283   size_t total = tag->vertexCount;
00284   for (i = 0; i < num_indices; ++i)
00285     if (index_array[i] >= total)
00286       total = index_array[i] + 1;
00287   
00288     // If need more space
00289   if (total > tag->vertexCount)
00290   {
00291       // allocate more space
00292     tag->vertexData = realloc( tag->vertexData, tag->desc.size * total );
00293       // if a default value, initialize new space with it
00294     if (tag->defaultValue)
00295     {
00296       data = ((char*)tag->vertexData) + tag->vertexCount * tag->desc.size;
00297       for (i = tag->vertexCount; i < total; ++i)
00298       {
00299         memcpy( data, tag->defaultValue, tag->desc.size );
00300         data += tag->desc.size;
00301       }
00302     }
00303     else
00304     {
00305       memset( (char*)tag->vertexData + tag->vertexCount * tag->desc.size, 0, 
00306               (total - tag->vertexCount) * tag->desc.size );
00307     }
00308     tag->vertexCount = total;
00309   }
00310   
00311     // Store passed tag values
00312   data = (char*)tag->vertexData;
00313   const char* iter = (const char*)values;
00314   for (i = 0; i < num_indices; ++i)
00315   {
00316     memcpy( data + index_array[i]*tag->desc.size, iter, tag->desc.size );
00317     iter += tag->desc.size;

00362 bool MeshImplTags::tag_has_vertex_data( size_t tag_index, MsqError& err ) 
00363 {
00364   --tag_index;
00365   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || !tagList[tag_index])
00366   {
00367     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00368     return false;
00369   }
00370   
00371   TagData* tag = tagList[tag_index];
00372   return 0 != tag->vertexData || tag->defaultValue;
00373 }

00375 bool MeshImplTags::tag_has_element_data( size_t tag_index, MsqError& err ) 
00376 {
00377   --tag_index;
00378   if (tag_index >= tagList.size() || !tagList[tag_index])
00379   {
00380     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00381     return false;
00382   }
00383   
00384   TagData* tag = tagList[tag_index];
00385   return 0 != tag->elementData || tag->defaultValue;
00386 }
00387 
00388 MeshImplTags::TagIterator MeshImplTags::tag_begin()
00389 {
00390   size_t index = 0;
00391   while (index < tagList.size() && tagList[index] == NULL)
00392     ++index;
00393   return TagIterator( this, index );
00394 }
00395 
00396 MeshImplTags::TagIterator MeshImplTags::TagIterator::operator++()
00397 {
00398   ++index;
00399   while (index < tags->tagList.size() && NULL == tags->tagList[index])
00400     ++index;
00401   return TagIterator( tags, index );
00402 }
00403 
00404 MeshImplTags::TagIterator MeshImplTags::TagIterator::operator--()
00405 {
00406   --index;
00407   while (index < tags->tagList.size() && NULL == tags->tagList[index])
00408     --index;
00409   return TagIterator( tags, index );
00410 }
00411 
00412 MeshImplTags::TagIterator MeshImplTags::TagIterator::operator++(int)
00413 {
00414   size_t old = index;
00415   ++index;
00416   while (index < tags->tagList.size() && NULL == tags->tagList[index])
00417     ++index;
00418   return TagIterator( tags, old );
00419 }
00420 
00421 MeshImplTags::TagIterator MeshImplTags::TagIterator::operator--(int)
00422 {
00423   size_t old = index;
00424   --index;
00425   while (index < tags->tagList.size() && NULL == tags->tagList[index])
00426     --index;
00427   return TagIterator( tags, old );
00428 }
